title: Customer Signup Success
description: Test that a new customer can successfully sign up with a valid email, phone, and password meeting the minimum length requirements.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/signup with valid name, email, phone, and password (>=6 chars).
Verify response status is 200 and success flag is true and a user object and JWT token are returned.

title: Customer Signup Failure - Password Too Short
description: Test signup failure when password does not meet minimum length requirements.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/signup with a password shorter than 6 characters.
Verify response is an error with appropriate validation message and status code.

title: Customer Login Success with Email
description: Test that customer can login with correct email and password.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid email and password.
Verify response status is 200 and contains success flag, user object, and JWT token.

title: Customer Login Failure - Incorrect Password
description: Test login failure when password is incorrect.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid email but wrong password.
Verify response indicates authentication failure with proper error status.

title: Admin Login Success
description: Test that admin user can login with correct username and password.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/admin/login with valid username and password.
Verify success response with admin user object and JWT token.

title: List Products with Pagination and Filters
description: Test retrieving product list with pagination, category filter, stock status filter, and search query.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/products?page=1&limit=10&category=vegetables&in_stock=true&search=tomato.
Verify response status 200, includes products matching filters, max 10 items, and pagination metadata.

title: Get Product by Valid ID
description: Test retrieval of product details by valid product ID.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/products/{valid_product_id}.
Verify response status 200 and product details including images, stock status, and price.

title: Get Product with Invalid ID
description: Test error response when requesting product details with invalid or non-existent product ID.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/products/{invalid_product_id}.
Verify response contains appropriate 404 or error code indicating product not found.

title: Admin Create Product Success
description: Test that an admin can create a new product with all required fields including valid imageUrl and stock quantity.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/admin/products with valid product details and admin JWT token.
Verify response status success and that the product is created with correct attributes.

title: Admin Create Product Failure - Missing Required Fields
description: Test failure when admin attempts to create a product leaving out required fields like name or category.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/admin/products missing required 'name' or 'category' fields with valid admin token.
Verify validation error is returned with proper status code.

title: Admin Update Product Successfully
description: Test admin updating existing product fields including price, stockQty, and imageUrl.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/admin/products/{product_id} with modified product data and valid admin JWT token.
Verify response indicates success and product attributes are updated accordingly.

title: Admin Update Product Stock Only
description: Test patch update to product stock quantity field only.

steps.description: Send PATCH request to /api/admin/products/{product_id}/stock with a new stockQty value and admin token.
Verify success response and stock quantity updated correctly.

title: Create Order Successfully
description: Test a logged-in user can create an order with valid items and address id.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/orders with valid items array (productId and qty) and addressId, authorized with user token.
Verify order is created successfully and response contains order details.

title: Create Order Failure - Empty Items List
description: Test that order creation fails when the items list is empty or missing.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/orders with empty or missing items array.
Verify validation error with appropriate status code is returned.

title: User Retrieve Own Orders with Pagination
description: Test fetching logged-in user's own orders with pagination parameters.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/orders?page=1&limit=10 authorized with user token.
Verify response contains a paginated list of user's orders.

title: Admin List Orders with Filters
description: Test that admin can retrieve list of orders filtered by status and search query with pagination.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/admin/orders?page=1&limit=20&status=confirmed&search=customerName with admin token.
Verify response contains filtered orders list with correct pagination.

title: Admin Update Order Status and Assign Delivery Boy
description: Test admin can update order status and assign a delivery boy successfully.

steps.description: Send PATCH request to /api/admin/orders/{order_id}/status with new status and assignedDeliveryId using admin auth.
Verify order status is updated properly and delivery boy assigned.

title: Admin Assign Delivery Boy to Order
description: Test admin assigning a delivery boy to an order explicitly.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/admin/orders/{order_id}/assign with deliveryBoyId in body and admin token.
Verify success response and delivery boy is assigned to the order.

title: Delivery Boy Login Success
description: Test delivery personnel can login successfully using phone number and optionally FCM token.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/delivery/login with valid phone number and optional FCM token.
Verify success response with token and delivery user info.

title: Delivery Boy View Assigned Orders
description: Test delivery boy can fetch list of assigned orders after login.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/delivery/orders with valid delivery boy token.
Verify response contains all orders assigned to this delivery boy.

title: Delivery Boy Update Order Status Valid Transitions
description: Test delivery boy can update order status to picked, out_for_delivery, and delivered in correct sequence.

steps.description: Send PATCH request to /api/delivery/orders/{order_id}/status with status 'picked' and valid token.
Verify success response and order status updated.
Send PATCH request to same endpoint with status 'out_for_delivery'.
Verify success response and status updated.
Send PATCH request with status 'delivered' and paymentType set to either 'cod' or 'qr'.
Verify final success and order marked delivered with payment recorded.

title: Delivery Boy Update Order Status Invalid Transition
description: Test system rejects invalid or out-of-order status updates by delivery boy.

steps.description: Attempt to update order status from 'pending' directly to 'delivered' without prior statuses.
Verify error response indicating invalid status transition.

title: Admin Upload Product Image
description: Test admin can upload a product image file successfully and receive a valid URL in response.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/admin/upload-product-image with multipart/form-data containing valid image file and admin token.
Verify response contains a URL string for the uploaded image.

title: User Update Phone Number Successfully
description: Test logged-in user can update their phone number to a valid 10-digit value.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/user/phone with valid 10-digit phone number and user token.
Verify success response indicating phone updated.

title: User Update Phone Number Failure Invalid Format
description: Test failure when trying to update phone with an invalid format (not 10 digits).

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/user/phone with incorrectly formatted phone number.
Verify validation error response.

title: User Update Location Successfully
description: Test user can update location with valid latitude, longitude, full address, city, and pincode.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/user/location with all required fields valid and authorized.
Verify success response indicating location saved.

title: User Update Location Failure - Invalid Pincode
description: Test failure when user submits update location with pincode not matching six digit pattern.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/user/location with invalid pincode format.
Verify validation error is returned.

title: User Get Default Address
description: Test user can retrieve their default saved address successfully.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/user/address with valid user token.
Verify response contains default address details.

title: User Update FCM Token
description: Test user can update their push notification FCM token for receiving notifications.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/user/fcm-token with valid non-empty token string and authorization.
Verify success response confirming FCM token updated.

title: Health Check Endpoint
description: Test server health check endpoint returns status OK.

steps.description: Send GET request to /health.
Verify response status 200 and body contains { "status": "ok" } or equivalent.
